Html:
I'm posting this here because this is where it matters to me, but it should probably be passed on to the CodePlex team:

Why on earth can I insert formatted code snippets in the Discussions section, but not in the Issue Tracker?

And, you know, bold text.
Thanks for the feedback.  You can file requests with the CodePlex team at: http://codeplex.codeplex.com/workitem/list/basic
